lines.text: You should have seen the Atlantic Ocean back then.
Oh, I never use seatbelts. I don't believe in gravity.
A room. For me and my mother.
Yes, it used to be beautiful - what with the rackets, whoring, guns.
You mean Lou? He used run numbers for the dinosaurs.
Mrs. Matthews, you can claim the body tomorrow.

[walking away to the exit]
I don't want the body!

[to Dave]
You're like King Midas in reverse. I don't want you touching my stuff.

[to Dave]
You look like a fire sale.
Why are you doing this for me?
Hey, it's nothing, Sinatra gives wings to hospitals. We all do what we can.
